name: Smart Heroes DEMO GAME
description:
The city is full of giant monsters fueled by the damage humans provided to our mother nature. These man-made pollutions gave birth to the gigantic monster that wants to destroy all humanity. And the only way to cancel humanity’s extinction is to have a hero, a Smart Hero.

Smart Heroes is an educational game focused on providing an enjoyable RPG game with an educational gameplay mechanics to add value on the screen time to your kids. This serves as an interactive academic practice exam that will let the Smart Hero player to use their academic knowledge to enable their hero power to provide damage to their enemies and defeat them to save the city. May it be mathematics, reading or spelling there are a lot of opportunities for these Smart heroes to practice their academic knowledge and have fun at the same time.
